entry.dcterms:title: Situation of Those With No Possibility of Further Receiving Unemployment Benefit in 2000
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E41: Situation of Those With No Possibility of Further Receiving Unemployment Benefit in 2000. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Gyula
entry.dcterms:description: the effects of the changes in unemployment benefit regulations from May 1, 2000, using the aid after the unemployment benefit expires, the income situation of the household members of the respondent, family incomes, expenses
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
social welfare policy and systems
income, property and savings
person
survey data
cross-section

The sample was made up of persons whose unemployment benefit expires between the first half of April 2000 or in May. The persons to be interviewed were selected from the registry of the Hungarian National Labor Research and Methodology Center (OMKMK). This diminishing sample included 5001 persons in the end.
face-to-face interview
A
